Class ec.e.file.EReadableFile 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.file.EDirectoryEntry
           |
           +----ec.e.file.EReadableFile
public class EReadableFile
extends EDirectoryEntry
implements EFileInfo
A sturdy representation of a file which may be opened for (sequential or random-access) reading.

inputStream()
Produce an InputStream that will read this file.
isDirectory()
Test if this entry describes a directory (it doesn't).
lastModified()
Determines the time that the file represented by this object was last modified.
length()
Length in bytes of this file.
reader()
Produce an instance of EFileReader that will read this file.

inputStream 
  public InputStream inputStream() throws IOException
Produce an InputStream that will read this file.
isDirectory 
  public boolean isDirectory()
Test if this entry describes a directory (it doesn't).
Returns:
false, since this is a file
Overrides:
isDirectory in class EDirectoryEntry
length 
  public long length()
Length in bytes of this file.
lastModified 
  public long lastModified()
Determines the time that the file represented by this object was last modified. As per the Java class library spec, the return value is system-dependent and should only be used to compare with other values returned by lastModified(). It should not be interpreted as an absolute time.
Returns:
the "time" the file specified by this object was last modified
reader 
  public EFileReader reader() throws IOException
Produce an instance of EFileReader that will read this file.
